exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

exceptions.tactic: exists (lf * g x + f x * lg).

original: intros Hf Hg. destruct Hf as [lf Hdf]. destruct Hg as [lg Hdg]. exists (lf * g x + f x * lg). apply is_derive_mult; auto.
